about_the_game:
This is Cruel TD's DLC prop package.
Props include :19 Gold66 +199 Iron66 +1999 Plastic66
Game props can reduce the difficulty of the game, speed up the game experience time.
If you prefer a gradual approach, it is not recommended to buy. These items can be acquired gradually throughout the game.
